name: Hollywood Trivia
overview: Take part in many different quiz's with a multiple selection of answers. Hollywood Trivia is a multiple choice Shareware quiz game with 400 questions. There a eight topics, each topic contains fifty questions and a related picture. The questions appear along with four possible answers. Every time you answer a question right you will be shown a small portion of the related picture. Once you have answered all fifty questions the entire picture will be displayed and the player will be asked to choose another subject.
